conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. All 3D attributes are correctly represented.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of the 3D isometric perspective. Wall height, thickness, and volume are all clearly defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout. The complex arrangement of bedrooms, utility area, and multiple toilets is reproduced with exact spatial fidelity.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the 2D plan suggestions perfectly. Points deducted only for omission of balcony table/chair details shown in 2D.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering. One minor deductuon for the simplified window frames which appear slightly blocky.

detected_errors.description: Balcony furniture from the 2D plan is missing in the 3D render.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains rigorous geometric accuracy and room proportions relative to the source floor plan.
